topic.title: Unit Back In Service Time - conformance rules

section.p: Time the unit is back in service

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11437 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.45"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11150)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10863)/@code="69477-8" Unit was back in service and available for response [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10862)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:10864)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.13
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11150)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10863)/@code="69477-8" Unit was back in service and available for response [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10862)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:10864)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.13

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.45" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="69477-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Unit was back in service and available for response [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="TS"/> </observation>
